fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, make a rule concerning players' actions in the public day chat. That rule is announced at the start of the next day.
- Anyone who breaks that rule except you is modkilled. You must break each rule you make the day after you make it, or you're modkilled.
- You can't choose to not make a rule, and being roleblocked/etc. doesn't affect your rule-making.
- Rules go away after you die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game, or have three wrongdoers punished for breaking your rules, or break three of your own rules without being caught.
